project_info.title: AI at Work: Prompting, Oversight & Security

outline.title: AI at Work: Prompting, Oversight & Security
outline.summary: Title slide introducing the session on practical, safe, and reliable use of AI at work, covering prompting, oversight, and security essentials.

outline.title: What is AI?
outline.summary: Working definition, common types, and strengths vs. limits.

outline.title: Where AI Is Good (and Why)
outline.summary: Highlights AI's strengths in drafting, summarizing, extracting information, brainstorming, and handling repetitive tasks with clear rules.

outline.title: Where AI Is Risky/Weak (and Why)
outline.summary: Identifies AI's limitations including hallucinations, inaccuracy with numbers and dates, and challenges with novel edge cases and high-stakes decisions.

outline.title: Prompting Blueprint (Core Pattern)
outline.summary: Presents the five-part prompting structure: Role, Goal, Inputs, Constraints, and Output format for effective AI interactions.

outline.title: Bad → Better Prompt Examples
outline.summary: Demonstrates the transformation from vague prompts to specific, structured prompts with clear roles, constraints, and output formats.

outline.title: Context Is King
outline.summary: What to include: relevant snippets, audience specs, source links, and ask-when-missing instructions.

outline.title: The Perfect Prompt (Full Example)
outline.summary: A real-world prompt example with Role, Goal, Context, Constraints, and Output—ready to copy.

outline.title: Cheat Sheet (Starters)
outline.summary: Ready-to-use prompt starters for common tasks.

outline.title: What’s Wrong?
outline.summary: Side-by-side weak vs strong prompt comparison with explanation.

outline.title: Security & Privacy Basics
outline.summary: Covers essential security practices including data minimization, avoiding sensitive information, and following approved data handling rules.

outline.title: EU Essentials
outline.summary: Core EU‑specific considerations for AI work (privacy, safety, transparency).

outline.title: Decision Tree: Use AI or Not?
outline.summary: Presents decision criteria for when to use AI, when to proceed with caution, and when to avoid AI usage entirely.

outline.title: Hands-On Exercise (10 Minutes)
outline.summary: Provides a practical exercise to turn a messy customer email into a clear response using the prompting blueprint and evaluation checklist.
